participant_1.background:
I met my husband at a dog park and we fell in love over our shared love of animals.
i run more then 2 miles a day even though i hate it.
my temper is pretty short.
My most difficult challenge was raising my children on my own.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
I sometimes worry about my cats' safety when I'm on tour.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well! I'm a single mom of two boys and I work as a nurse. I love running, but I hate it at the same time.
I'm glad you're doing well! I'm a writer who's looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can focus on my writing. I also love to eat the skin of the apple.
That sounds like a nice home! I love the woods. I'm not a good writer, but I love to read. Do you have any favorite books?
I love mermaid books! I have a whole collection of them and I love to imagine swimming with them. I also worry about my cats' safety when I'm on tour.
I love mermaids too! I think they're so beautiful. I'm not sure I would want to swim with them though. I'm afraid I would get lost in the ocean.
I'm sure you'd be fine! Mermaids are very friendly creatures.
I'm glad to hear that! I've always been a little afraid of the ocean.
You should come with me on my next tour! I'll introduce you to my mermaid friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to go.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm planning my next trip
